Name: classid
Description: The OID of the system catalog the dependent object is in

Name: objid
Description: The OID of the specific dependent object

Name: objsubid
Description: For a table column, this is the column number (the objid and classid\nrefer to the table itself). For all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: refclassid
Description: The OID of the system catalog the referenced object is in

Name: refobjid
Description: The OID of the specific referenced object

Name: refobjsubid
Description: For a table column, this is the column number (the refobjid and refclassid refer to the table itself). For all\nother object types, this column is zero.

Name: deptype
Description: A code defining the specific semantics of this dependency\nrelationship; see text
